message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $12,000. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm interested in the product, but I'm trying to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but $9,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,500, but I'm not going any lower. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make a deal!

I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but $9,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $9,250. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
